subject: Soccer
World Cup (Soccer)
lead_paragraph: Two years ago, when Barcelona dumped him, Ronaldinho seemed broken in spirit. Now he is back in the form which could earn him a chance to redeem his failure with Brazil at the last World Cup.
snippet: Two years ago, when Barcelona dumped him, Ronaldinho seemed broken in spirit. Now he is back in the form which could earn him a chance to redeem his failure with Brazil at the last World Cup.
